mapper.update: update app_bank_cr_fa set bank_cash_receive_detail_id = #{bankCashReceiveDetailId}, bank_cash_receive_id = #{bankCashReceiveId}, account_no = #{accountNo}, department_id = #{departmentId}, amount = #{amount}, job_order_no = #{jobOrderNo} where bank_cash_receive_detail_id = #{bankCashReceiveDetailId};
